com.adobe.cq.social.commons.comments.api

Interface CommentCollectionConfiguration

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CalendarConfiguration, FileLibraryConfiguration, ForumConfiguration
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCommentCollectionConfiguration, AbstractFileLibraryConfiguration, BaseForumConfiguration, CalendarConfigurationImpl, QnaConfiguration

    @ProviderType
public interface CommentCollectionConfiguration

    • Method Detail

      • isVotingAllowed

        boolean isVotingAllowed()
        Returns:
        true if the comment can be voted

      • isAttachmentAllowed

        boolean isAttachmentAllowed()
        Allows attachment.
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • isRTEEnabled

        boolean isRTEEnabled()
        Checks if is RTE enabled.
        Returns:
        true, if is RTE enabled

      • isCustomFlagReasonAllowed

        boolean isCustomFlagReasonAllowed()
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if custom flag reasons are allowed. The JCR of this attribute is called "seFlagReasonFreeformText"

      • isTranslateAllButtonAllowed

        boolean isTranslateAllButtonAllowed()
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if translate all button are allowed. The JCR of this attribute is called "allowTranslateAllButton"

      • isCloseAllowed

        boolean isCloseAllowed()
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if closing a tree of replies is allowed.The JCR of this attribute is called "allowCloseComments"

      • isPinAllowed

        boolean isPinAllowed()
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if pinning is allowed.The JCR of this attribute is called "allowPinComments"

      • isFlaggingAllowed

        boolean isFlaggingAllowed()
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if flagging content is allowed.The JCR of this attribute is called "allowFlagComments"

      • isDenyAllowed

        boolean isDenyAllowed()
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if denying a tree of replies is allowed.The JCR of this attribute is called "allowDenyComments"

      • isMoveAllowed

        boolean isMoveAllowed()
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if moving a thread is allowed.The JCR of this attribute is called "allowMove"

      • isEditAllowed

        boolean isEditAllowed()
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if denying a tree of replies is allowed. The JCR of this attribute is called "allowDenyComments"

      • isReplyAllowed

        boolean isReplyAllowed()
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if replying to comments is allowed. The JCR of this attribute is called "allowRepliesToComments"

      • isDeleteAllowed

        boolean isDeleteAllowed()
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if deleting comments is allow for a user. The JCR of this attribute is called "allowDeleteComments"

      • getPageSize

        int getPageSize()
        Returns:
        the default number of comments on a page as configured on the component. If there is no configuration, this defaults to 10.

      • isFollowingAllowed

        boolean isFollowingAllowed()
        Returns:
        setting value of the following allowed configuration.

      • isSubscriptionsAllowed

        boolean isSubscriptionsAllowed()
        Returns:
        setting value of the email subscribing allowed configuration.

      • getSortOrder

        CollectionSortedOrder getSortOrder()
        Returns:
        the default sort order of comments on a page as configured on the component. If there is no configuration, this defaults to CollectionSortedOrder.REVERSED_ORDER.

      • getSortFields

        java.util.List<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean>> getSortFields()
        Gets the sort fields. For a sort field [{"subject", true},{"added", false}] like this would sort UGC based on subject in ascending order and then by create date for UGC with the same subject
        Returns:
        the sort fields

      • getSortByItemsList

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSortByItemsList()
        Gets the default sort item list
        Returns:
        the default sort items

      • getAnalyticsTimeSelector

        java.lang.String getAnalyticsTimeSelector()
        Get the default time selector for analytics properties like "last 24 hours" , "last 7 days" etc.
        Returns:
        the default analytics time selector

      • isFeaturingContentAllowed

        boolean isFeaturingContentAllowed()
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if marking 'Featured Content' is allowed. The JCR of this attribute is called "allowFeaturedContent"

      • isMentionsEnabled

        boolean isMentionsEnabled()

      • getMaxMentions

        int getMaxMentions()

      • getUIMentionPattern

        java.lang.String getUIMentionPattern()

      • getThumbNailSize

        int getThumbNailSize()
        Returns:
        Get the maximum Thumbnail size set by user for the component.

      • getMinimumImgSizeForThumbnail

        long getMinimumImgSizeForThumbnail()
        Returns:
        Get the minimum image size to produce thumbnail image. If image size is below this, thumbnail won't be generated

      • isDoNotGetRepliesOnListingPage

        boolean isDoNotGetRepliesOnListingPage()
